entry.ptxt: Transponder code in the transponder built in the ignition key cannot be read through ICM.

item.ptxt: Use of the ignition key without the transponder
Use of the unregistered ignition key
Corruption of the transponder in the ignition key

test1.ptxt: Clear DTC(s) referring to DTC Clearance:Petrol Engine Model .
Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Check if any DTC is detected referring to DTC Check:Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.title: Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) check

test1.ptxt: Check if any DTC other than P1614 is detected referring to DTC Check:Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Is any DTC other than P1614 is detected?

action.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the corresponding flowchart in this section, and then go to Step 3.

testgroup.title: Registration of the ignition key in use with ECM and Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check

test1.ptxt: There is a possibility that the unregistered ignition key is used. Therefore, register the transponder code in the transponder in the ignition key with ECM referring to Registration of the Ignition Key:Petrol Engine Model .
Check if DTC P1614 is detected referring to DTC Check:Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Is DTC P1614 detected?

testgroup.title: Registration of the new ignition key with ECM and Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) check

test1.ptxt: The transponder in the ignition key is corrupted or the ignition key without the transponder is used. Therefore, prepare the new ignition key.
Register the transponder code in the transponder in the new ignition key with ECM referring to Registration of the Ignition Key:Petrol Engine Model .
Check if that DTC P1614 is detected referring to DTC Check:Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Is DTC P1614 detected?

test1.ptxt: Check ICM referring to Inspection of Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) and Its Circuit:Petrol Engine Model .

paragroup.ptxt: Then perform Procedure after ECM Replacement:Petrol Engine Model .

action.ptxt: Replace ICM with new one referring to Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation:Petrol Engine Model .
